InfluenceRule.name: If %i% is annoyed with %r%, %i% will be more likely to want to blow off plans in order to not hang out with the person they are annoyed with.
If %i% is angry with %r%, %i% will be more likely to want to blow off plans because they are still mad.
If %i% has a crush on %r%, %i% will be less likely to want to blow off plans because s/he would want to spend as much time as possible with %r%.
If %i% is lonely, %i% is a little less likely to blow off plans because %i% wants someone to hang out with.
If %i% is mean, %i% is a more less likely to blow off plans.
If %i% is outgoing, %i% is a little less likely to blow off plans.
If %i% and %r% are dating, %i% is a little less likely to want to blow off plans.
If %r% is forgiving, %r% is less likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% is loving, %r% is less likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% is irritable, %r% is more likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% is loyal, %r% is less likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% is insecure, %r% is more likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% is angry at, %r% is more likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% isannoyed with %i%, %r% is more likely to accept the blow-off.
If %r% feels superior to %i%, %r% is less likely to accept the blow-off because s/he feels like s/he doesn't need to.

Effect.PerformanceRealization: %i% tried to blow off plans with %r%
%r% thought %i% %pron(i,was/were)% joking about blowing off plans to hang out
%i% %pron(i,was/were)% too nice to blow off plans with %r%
%i% blew off plans with %r% to be with %o%
%i% blew off plans with %r% even though %list(i,r,we/they)% were dating
%i% blew off plans with %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(r,bf,gf)% for some roleplaying game
%i% pretended to make plans with %r% because %list(i,r,we/they)% were like frenemies or something
%i% tried to blow off plans with %r% but despite the mutual hatred didn't succeed
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% super let down when %is% cancelled those hang-out plans
%r% %pron(r,was/were)% totally chill about %i% spending more time with %pron(i,his/her)% %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %buddy%! We still hanging out later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, yeah... about that...
I'm actually kind of sort of going to be like, busy.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh... well maybe later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeahhh... I'm busy later, too, I think. Pretty much forever actually. Soo...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I get it.
%greeting%, %i%! We still hanging out later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, yeah... about that...
I don't think I can make it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Whatever. Don't be such a flake! You totally can.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... well... yeah, I guess. OK.
Uh, %r%... about those plans we had for later...
I can't make it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: I should have expected this from a %gender(i,guy,girl)% who likes %toc1%s.
btw we are so not friends any more.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey, %r%... I found something more fun to do than hang out with you tonight. Sorry or whatever.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, I'm not surprised. Consider yourself defriended.
I'm totally posting a status update about this. 'omg %i% is such a jerk.'
%greeting%, %buddy%! We still hanging out later?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, yeah... about that. I, uh...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %gender(i,Dude,Honey)%, after everything that's happened today, you had better not be flaking out on me.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh, no, definitely not! Looking forward to it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %i%! So I'll see you later on, right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Um, yeah... about that...
I don't think I can make it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh, %i%, you're such a kidder. Is this like that time when %toc1%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... yeah probably.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: %greeting%, %buddy%! %gender(r,I'm totally stoked,I am SO excited)% to hang out with you later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... yeah... well... the thing is, I... uh...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? You're not going to blow off our plans, are you?
Because I know you're totally too nice a person to do that. Anyway, see you later!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... yeah... guess so.

Instantiation.name: BlowOffPlans - Dating + Friends + Cheating w/ O Accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... Listen, %sweetie%, I kinda can't hang out with you tonight.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Why %sweetie%!? I've - we've - been looking forward to this for months!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Erm, well, actually... Only you have. You see, for a while now - I've kinda been seeing someone else... %o%.
And, I have plans with %o% that I've been looking forward to for months...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: With %o%!? How could you!?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: How couldn't I! Have you seen %o% lately? Smokin' hot!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: .... You shallow %pejorative%!
%sweetie%! You ready to hang out with me and my friends tonight? I'm so excited! We're gonna-

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah... About that... I really can't make it.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What? Why?! My friends were really looking forward to hanging out with you!!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I know! I know! I was too! it's just that %random(my cat died and I have to arrange the funeral,my stepdad has a cold and I have to monitor his vitals,I've got a huge project due tomorrow that I haven't even started)%.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's probably the lamest excuse I've *ever* heard!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: But it's true!!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: No. Not this time. I'm done trying to be a better friend for you.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %sweetie%. How yah doing?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: How am I doing? I'm doing fantastic! I'm just so excited for our big plans tonight!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh yeah! Me too! Man it's going to be awesome!!
Wait, hold on a sec, %sweetie%.
What!? Are you serious!? Oh... my... god.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What's wrong %i%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't believe it... Yes. Yes. Okay. Yeah, I'll be there tonight.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: What was that about, %sweetie%?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I'll tell you about it later. I can't make it tonight though, this is an absolute emergency!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: O... Okay. Text me later.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: I can't believe I forgot about our 'Crypts and Centaurs' game tonight. I hope Mom baked cookies.
Hey %pejorative%face. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not a lot, %random(Chunks,Filth,puke for brains)%. We still on for tonight?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You thought I was seriously about that? OMG that's hilarious.
HEY EVERYBODY! %r% thought I was seriously about planning to hang out with %pron(r,him/her)% tonight. What a LOSER!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's too bad, %i%. Cause those plans were only a setup for a painful and humiliating practical joke.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You know, it's not funny pretending to be friends with you any longer. Consider us defrenemied.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That is so not a word, you absolute %pejorative%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... so I know you were excited to hang out tonight, but...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Excited? Are you *kidding* me? I'm so looking forward to it. It's gonna be good times, %buddy%, excellent times!

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Yeah, well unfortunately the thing is...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: We're gonna %random(make popcorn,watch movies,make banana sandwiches)% and %random(prank call people,rock out to tunes,hang out in the bean bag chairs)% and just have a total blast. Am I right?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Uh... actually no. I can't make it.
Yeah, something else came up. A thing. Uh, it'll probably take all night. So...

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: If you don't want to be friends any more, %i%, I wish you'd just come out and say it rather than making up lies.
Just forget it.

Instantiation.name: BlowOffPlans - hanging out with gf accept

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %gender(r,dude,girl)%, I know we had plans to hang later on, but my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend has really been wanting some '%i% time%'... you know how it is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: *Again?* Wow, %i%, that's just epic lame. I really don't think it's healthy how %o% seems to be totally controlling every aspect of your life these days.
What happened to '%if(0,bros before hoes)elseif(1,sisters before misters)else(best friends forever)%?'

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Look, I don't make the rules, I just play the game.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Well I'm through playing games with you, %i%. Have fun with your precious %o%.

Instantiation.name: BlowOffPlans - hanging out with gf reject

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%... %gender(r,dude,girl)%, I know we had plans to hang later on, but my %gender(o,boy,girl)%friend has really been wanting some '%i% time%'... you know how it is.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: That's okay, %i%. I understand. You and %o% go have a great time together. We'll hang some other time.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh... thanks. I thought you'd be mad or something.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Oh no! I understand that relationships need a lot of work.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %r%, I'm glad I bumped into you. I've gotta cancel on our plans tonight, I forgot and made some different ones.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Typical. You're such a flake, %i%.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Oh, is that what you think? Well maybe we shouldn't be friends at all, then.

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah, maybe not.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Hey %pejorative%face. What's up?

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Not a lot, %random(Chunks,Filth,puke for brains)%. We still on for tonight?

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: You thought I was seriously about that? OMG that's hilarious.
HEY EVERYBODY! %r% thought I was seriously about planning to hang out with %pron(r,him/her)% tonight. What a LOSER!

LineOfDialogue.responderLine: Yeah but seriously, my house at 8.
